title: Trouble loading in - game never loads, have to restart PC and reconnect
body:
I've been having issues loading into games lately - champ select is usually a slow load in, so that is probably problematic too, but with loading in, the summoner's rift background comes up, but no champions show up - it stays like this for ages, and never actually does anything. I restart my PC, and reconnect, and it takes a little bit but it does end up loading eventually. Been happening for about a month, resulting in people choosing to /remake just as I get into games.

Pls help.

PS. If I load into a quick custom the problem seems to not occur. But definitely not ideal.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you using a wired or wireless connection?

Switch to a wired connection if possible, does this issue still occur?

Hey there,

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
